external_games.name: Demon Slayer -Kimetsu no Yaiba- The Hinokami Chronicles 2

name: Demon Slayer: The Hinokami Chronicles 2
summary:
Sega has announced Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba – The Hinokami Chronicles 2, the latest issue of Weekly Jump reveals. Platforms and a release date are currently unknown, but it will be playable at Jump Festa 2025, which will run from December 21 to 22 at Makuhari Messe in Chiba, Japan.

The story of Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba – The Hinokami Chronicles 2 will cover everything from the Entertainment District Arc to the Hashira Training Arc.
